code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{FaBars,FaTimes,FaUserCircle,FaHome}from'react-icons/fa';import logo from'../assets/logo.jpg';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[isOpen,setIsOpen]=useState(false);const toggleMenu=()=>setIsOpen(!isOpen);const navLinks=[{name:'About',path:'/about'},{name:'Products',path:'/products'},{name:'Buyer',path:'/buyer'},{name:'Sellers',path:'/sellers'},{name:'Faq',path:'/faq'},{name:'Contact',path:'/contact'},{name:'Blogs',path:'/blogs'},{name:'Resources',path:'/resources'},{name:'Tracking',path:'/tracking'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"navbar-logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"World of Steel"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu-icon",onClick:toggleMenu,children:isOpen?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTimes,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaBars,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:isOpen?'nav-menu active':'nav-menu',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"nav-links",onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaHome,{size:24})})}),navLinks.map((link,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:link.path,className:"nav-links",onClick:toggleMenu,children:link.name})},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item mobile-only",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"nav-links-btn",onClick:toggleMenu,children:"Login / Sign Up"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/login",className:"btn-primary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaUserCircle,{className:"btn-icon"})," Login / Sign Up"]})})]})});};export default Navbar;
